creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: long jacket with long sleeves; side slits; blue with predominately red trim; embroidered panels with tiny stitches, including cross stitch, on sides of front opening at top, trimmed with red tassels and beads; red flannel bands with blue and white stitched stripes; beaded fringe at sides; maroon beaded fringe at back of neck; purple, tan, maroon and white embroidery at cuffs and bottom
title: Woman's (or shaman's?) ceremonial jacket
